title: 爬行者世界（Takumi Craft）mc1.12.2版本的汉化文件
author: MashKJo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MashKJo 于 2020-6-23 11:45 编辑 

https://github.com/MashKJo233/Chinese-Lang-for-mod-Takumi-Craft/tree/1.12.2
这是我在GitHub建立的翻译项目，目前已经完工。



zh_cn.lang
(36.9 KB, 下载次数: 302)



2020-2-15 22:48 上传
点击文件名下载附件






拖入压缩包lang文件内即可使用。
爬行者世界搬运贴：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-867869-1-1.html


注：此汉化文件已经长时间不更新，如若需要最新版可以下载置顶楼的文件。
在此感谢@DofaAec

replies.author: Aikini
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Aikini 于 2020-2-15 23:56 编辑 

我觉得这个翻译可以再亲民一点，毕竟爬行者的中文译名已经更改为苦力怕了
还有你发错版块了吧，应该发去MOD衍生资源那里

replies.author: 断魂天涯
replies.txt_content: 哇！谢谢大佬分享

replies.author: zxu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 zxu 于 2020-3-16 13:41 编辑

Creeper  book.ZonbieCreeper=Creepers which are shaped zombie. Of course, they make villagers be zombie creepers. book.SilentCreeper=Creepers running silently. They runs afterimage. When you notice silent creeper, it must have explosed. book.SandCreeper=Creepers which create sand. We have to prepare torch to breath. book.WaterCreeper=Creepers which create water. Be careful not to be damaged your houce. book.LavaCreeper=Creepers which create lava. Be careful not to lose your items. book.FireCreeper=Creepers burn around them. It could easily burn a big forest. book.IceCreeper=Creepers which create ice. You are lucky, you can get ice which isn't melt without going ice spike plain. book.EnderCreeper=Creepers which have ender energy. When you hit the explosion, you will be teleport somewhere. book.LightCreeper=Creepers which can break lightning block. If it's sunny, and it's day time, it must be stronger. book.SlimeCreeper=Creepers which are shaped slime. replies.author: 赤刃泉润CQR
replies.txt_content:
有些翻译不够准确：
例如
颜色“Lime”简体应翻译成“黄绿色”，繁体为“淺綠色”，而不是“石灰”（严重错误）
“light blue”翻译亮蓝色也可以，不过若严格按原版的翻译的话，简体则是“淡蓝色”，而繁体为”淺藍色“
